definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Na 1:4 bud, sprout;—abs. ´[[פ]] Is 18:5 +, [[פָָּרַךְ]] Ex 25:33, Ex 37:19; cstr. [[פֶּרַח]] Na 1:4 +; sf. [[פִּרְחָהּ]] Nu 8:4, [[פִּרָחָם]] Is 5:24; pl. sf. [[פְּרֶחֶיהָ]] Ex 25:31 +;—bud, Is 5:24, of vine Is 18:5 (both fig.), Nu 17:23; [[לְבָנוֹן]] ´[[פ]] Na 1:4 the sprout of Lebanon (i. e. of its cedars); of bud-shaped ornament in temple 1Ki 7:26 ([[שׁוֹשָָׁן]] ´[[פ]]) v:1Ki 7:49 = 2Ch 4:5 ([[שׁוֹשַׁנׇּה]] ´[[פ]]) v:2Ch 4:21; in tabern. Ex 25:31, Ex 25:33, Ex 25:33, Ex 25:34, Ex 37:17, Ex 37:19, Ex 37:19, Ex 37:20, Nu 8:4.
